thread.title: Johnny Pearson-Hall

author: Johnny Pearson-Hall
title: Johnny Pearson-Hall
text:
From ordering my tyres to getting them fitted I am so pleased with the whole experience!
Researching my tyres and then ordering them on the website was really easy!
Clear communication via emails about my order and delivery/fitting day was great too. Emails were clear and concise.
I'd booked an anytime Sunday fitting and on early on in the morning I had an email with a 2 hour time slot of between 11.30 & 13.30. In fact they turned up at 10.30 so no complaints there!
The two guys who came to change my tyres were polite, friendly and really efficient. One of them was called Adam.
They were really quick and my four tyres were changed in no time.
After they left I received two emails, one explaining the work done and one with an invoice which was broken down into what I was paying for.
I wholeheartedly recommend using them and I certainly will again!
